typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SourceOSProjects
source(output(
		OS_Scenario_ID as integer,
		OSR_Project_Number as string,
		Scenario as string,
		Year_Submitted as integer,
		Version as integer,
		AsOfDate as timestamp,
		Comments as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		CreatedBy as string,
		Deleted as boolean,
		DeletedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SourceScenario
SourceOSProjects, SourceScenario join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
